metadata.title: CVE-2021-47550 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amd/amdgpu: fix potential memleak In function amdgpu_get_xgmi_hive,when kobject_init_and_add failed There is a potential memleak if not callkobject_put.

criterions.comment: linux-fips: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
linux-aws-fips: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
